scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && cpx "src/handler/files/**/*" dist/handler/files && cpx src/handler/schema.json dist/handler/ && cpx "src/event/files/**/*" dist/event/files && cpx src/event/schema.json dist/event/ && cpx src/collection.json dist/
scripts.release: yarn build && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: build dist" && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
